ALLPOWERS S200 200W 154Wh Portable Power Bank

The ALLPOWERS S200 200W 154Wh Portable Power Bank is a powerful yet compact solution for all your charging needs. Weighing only about 3 lbs and measuring 7.87*6.7*1.96 inches, this power bank is easy to carry in your bag, making it the perfect companion for outdoor work, studying in the library, or using your laptop in a cafe. With a capacity of 200W/154Wh/41600mAh, it can power your laptop for up to 3 hours, charge your phone 14 times, and your iPad 8 times.

Fully Charged Within 1.5 Hours

The Dual-way quick recharge technology in the ALLPOWERS S200 200W 154Wh Portable Power Bank will help you say goodbye to prolonged charging times. You can quickly reach 100% charge with 99W Fast Charging, giving you access to enough power whenever you need it.

Wireless Charging

The ALLPOWERS S200 Portable Power Bank features a wireless charger that supports most smartphones equipped with QI standard technology or other QI-enabled devices, making charging on the go a breeze.

Power Up to 5 Devices Simultaneously

ALLPOWERS S200 200W 154Wh Portable Power Bank is equipped with 1 AC outlet (110V 200W), 1 wireless charge, 2 USB-A ports, and 1 Type-C port. It allows you to power up to 5 devices simultaneously. Whether you're at home or outdoors, everyone will be taken care of.

Easy To Take Everywhere

The ALLPOWERS S200 is a lightweight, portable power supply that weighs only 3 lbs and has dimensions of 7.87*6.7*1.96 inches. When you're on the move, it won't be a hassle, allowing you to stay charged everywhere you go.

Suitable for Various Occasions

The ALLPOWERS S200 is your ultimate power source for any situation. With its 154Wh battery pack, it can charge laptops, phones, cameras, drones, holiday lights, and more. Whether you're working outdoors, studying, facing emergencies, or going on trips, this portable power bank has got you covered.

full_description:
ALLPOWERS SP027 100W Polycrystalline Solar Panel

The ALLPOWERS SP027 100W Polycrystalline Solar Panel offers high efficiency with up to 22% conversion rate, making it one-third lighter than traditional solar silicon panels of the same power. This solar panel kit is designed to provide 1/3 more total power in comparison to other portable solar panel kits of similar size.

Made for Solar Generator

The ALLPOWERS 100W foldable solar panel is compatible with the majority of solar generator models on the market because it was designed specifically for solar generators and portable power stations. It includes a number of connectors, such as MC4 to Anderson and MC4 to DC, to enable simple and seamless integration with your portable generator.

Wide Compatibility

ALLPOWERS SP027 foldable solar panel has an MC4 connector and is highly compatible with most solar generators on the market, providing a dependable and effective power source. The panel has an adjustable bracket to maximize sunlight exposure, and it is made of sturdy, waterproof nylon. Modern safety features like surge and short circuit protection keep you and your devices safe while in use.

Foldable & Portable

This ALLPOWERS SP027 100W Polycrystalline Solar Panel is extremely portable thanks to its foldable design; when folded, it measures just 20x25.6x1.2 inches and weighs 7.9 lbs. This makes it the perfect travel companion for remote locations and outdoor activities where electricity is scarce. The ALLPOWERS SP027 100W Polycrystalline Solar Panel offers a dependable and endless power source for your laptops, power stations, and other solar-powered devices wherever you go, whether you're hiking, camping, traveling by motorhome, or traveling in a caravan.

full_description:
ALLPOWERS S300 300W 288Wh Portable Power Station

The ALLPOWERS S300 300W 288Wh Portable Power Station is a versatile and reliable power solution. It features a 300W AC Pure Sine Wave Inverter with a 500W surge capacity, ensuring smooth and stable power output. With a capacity of 288Wh or 78000 mAh, it can power various devices and appliances for extended periods. The power station offers four convenient ways to recharge, including AC, USB-C, Solar, and Car charging, providing flexibility and adaptability for different scenarios. Its 100W Max MPPT Solar Input allows efficient solar charging for eco-friendly and cost-effective energy.

Charge 10 Devices Simultaneously

ALLPOWERS S300 300W 288Wh Portable Power Station comes with a 288 watt-hour battery pack. This portable power station is equipped with all the ports you need to charge up to 10 devices simultaneously. It features 2 AC ports (110V/60Hz, 300W, peak 500W), 1 TYPE-C port (5V-20V/60W max, QC3.0), 3 USB ports (5V/3A), 2 DC ports (12V/5A), 1 car socket (12V/10A), and a wireless charger (5V/2.1A) at the top.

4 Ways to Charge

The ALLPOWERS S300 offers four convenient ways to recharge its emergency battery supply. You can fully recharge it in 5-6 hours using an AC 110V wall socket, approximately 6 hours under direct sunlight with a solar panel (DC 100W Max, sold separately), or 6-7 hours by using a 12V/24V car cigarette socket (sold separately). Additionally, you can recharge it in 6-7 hours using a 60W (max) Type-C socket (not included).

Remote Control Without Network

Stay in control with the ALLPOWERS App, which supports iOS 9.0 or above/Android 4.3 or above. The app provides ultimate wireless stability with Bluetooth technology, allowing you to easily and reliably start the portable power station.

Wireless Charging Function

Enjoy the ease of wireless charging with the wireless charger for the ALLPOWERS S300 300W 288Wh Portable Power Station. You no longer need to deal with the hassle of data cables because all it takes to charge your devices is a touch. To use this feature, please make sure your device is capable of wireless charging.

2 LED Flashlights

Whether you're camping or facing power outages, the ALLPOWERS S300 has you covered with its two white LED flashlights. Enjoy steady light or flashing light SOS mode to ease your anxiety.

Widely Range of Application

The ALLPOWERS S300 is a powerful backup battery power supply suitable for various occasions. It can meet different kinds of electricity demands for emergencies, outdoor activities, home use, travel, camping, road trips, and more. Charge mobile phones, laptops, computers, GPS devices, walkie talkies, cameras, drones, holiday lights, in-car appliances, and much more. The portable power station uses a pure sine wave inverter, working faster, quieter, safer, and more stable.
